descriptionHTML:
The legendary T-34-85 on your android wear!

This application is NOT a development of Wargaming.net. Application is made in accordance with Wargaming Developer Partner
Program rules: http://eu.wargaming.net/developers/documentation/rules/rules/

This face will be able to decorate your favorite android wear. Also it is for fans of military hardware. Good luck on the battlefield!

If you like the watch face, please, rate it! 👍

================
Attention!!!

If you can't see watch face in “Android Wear”.

Open application “Android wear” on your smartphone. Please go to settings (small white gear in top right screen). Find option “Resync apps” and click it. Please, Wait. This resync all available apps on your watch. And you will see with face.
================
